segments.text: The perspective shows the counter and sink angled nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the divided window panes brightens the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman holds the dish towel bunched on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbelievably, water is pouring from the sink onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's streaming down the cabinet doors in sheets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is blank; she hasn't a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's figure is framed by the open cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate while reaching into the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool's legs are tilted; it's going to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl cooperates, standing attentive below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I pity the potential slip on that slippery puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden contrasts so much with this disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These small acts of rebellion feel poignant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene tugs at my heart with its risks.
segments.speaker: PAR
